turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order a coffee from Starbucks in Hollywood.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can do that for you. what did you want to order from starbucks in hollywood?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a Minty Americano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And a baigle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of bagel did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a plain cream with cream cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want the americano iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want milk in the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, did you need anything else in the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so what i heard you say was you'd like to order a venti americano with whole milk and a plain bagel with cream cheese from starbucks in hollywood.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that all right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total for this order is $7.50. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool, i've sent the order in. it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great take care.
